options.title: -c, --count
options.description: prefix lines by the number of occurrences

options.title: -c, --count
options.description: prefix lines by the number of occurrences

options.title: -d, --repeated
options.description: only print duplicate lines, one for each group

options.title: -d, --repeated
options.description: only print duplicate lines, one for each group

options.title: -D
options.description: print all duplicate lines

options.title: --all-repeated[=METHOD]
options.description: like -D, but allow separating groups with an empty line; METHOD={none(default),prepend,separate}

options.title: -f, --skip-fields=N
options.description: avoid comparing the first N fields

options.title: -f, --skip-fields=N
options.description: avoid comparing the first N fields

options.title: --group[=METHOD]
options.description: show all items, separating groups with an empty line; METHOD={separate(default),prepend,append,both}

options.title: -i, --ignore-case
options.description: ignore differences in case when comparing

options.title: -i, --ignore-case
options.description: ignore differences in case when comparing

options.title: -s, --skip-chars=N
options.description: avoid comparing the first N characters

options.title: -s, --skip-chars=N
options.description: avoid comparing the first N characters

options.title: -u, --unique
options.description: only print unique lines

options.title: -u, --unique
options.description: only print unique lines

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: -w, --check-chars=N
options.description: compare no more than N characters in lines

options.title: -w, --check-chars=N
options.description: compare no more than N characters in lines

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit
